member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration used for reading and writing CSV data.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.HasHeaderRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the CSV file has a header record. Default is true.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.Delimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter used to separate fields. Default is ',';

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.Quote
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to quote fields. Default is '"'.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.Comment
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to denote a line that is commented out. Default is '#'.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.AllowComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if comments are allowed. True to allow commented out lines, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.BufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the buffer used for reading and writing CSV files. Default is 2048.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.QuoteAllFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all fields are quoted when writing, or just ones that have to be. and cannot be true at the same time. Turning one on will turn the other off.
member.value: true if all fields should be quoted; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.QuoteNoFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether no fields are quoted when writing. and cannot be true at the same time. Turning one on will turn the other off.
member.value: true if [quote no fields]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.CountBytes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the number of bytes should be counted while parsing. Default is false. This will slow down parsing because it needs to get the byte count of every char for the given encoding. The needs to be set correctly for this to be accurate.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding used when counting bytes.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.CultureInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture info used to read an write CSV files.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfiguration.IgnoreQuotes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if quotes should be ingored when parsing and treated like any other character.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Database.CSV.CsvConfigurationException
member.summary: Represents configuration errors that occur.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

and just quote based on the shouldQuote parameter. When all fields are written for a record, must be called to complete writing of the current record.

member.name: M:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Data.DataItemProxyFactory.GetProxy(System.String,Neo.ApplicationFramework.Interfaces.IScreen)
member.summary: The purpose with this overloaded method is that it can be called from script, in order to get a proxy that ends up in the recorded proxy list, even after EndRecordProxies have been called, and thereby gets refreshed by the update timer in screen. The tag also gets activated and later on deactivated when closing the screen, but it's not batch activated.
member.param: Full name of tag to get proxy for.
Reference to the screen to record this proxy for.
member.returns: A dataitem proxy for the tag.

member.summary: Disconnects data items without removing them.

member.summary: Activates or deactivates DataItemProxyActivity without adding connected clients
member.param: proxy cookie name
true to activate, false to deactivate

The bitmap to build the region from.
The color key of the transparent color.
If the apply region should force a redraw immediately after the region has been applied.

member.summary: Determines if the cell content may 'escape' the bounds of the cell.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.Document.TableColumn.SizeToAvailable
member.summary: SizeToAvailable is a special value indicating that the table column should use all available space. If more than one column is set to SizeToAvailable the the available space will be equally distributed among these columns.

member.name: P:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.Document.TableRow.AutoHeight
member.summary: AutoHeight will tell the TableRow to use as much space vertically as is needed by the table rows content.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.BitmapPrintImageToGdiConverter
member.summary: Converts a bitmap image into a device context that can be used with native Gdi methods.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.BlockCollectionLayout
member.summary: BlockCollectionLayout performs layout of all child layout elements. Layout elements are always stacked on top of each other much like how a StackPanel works in WPF when it has its Orientation set to vertical.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.BlockLayoutElement
member.summary: BlockLayoutElement is a base for layout elements that wish to provide padding to the contained content.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.DeviceDependentThickness
member.summary: Represents a thickness on the four sides of a rectangle. In contrast to the Thickness class these values are calculated based on the resolution of the device and units are in pixels.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.BlockLayoutFactory
member.summary: Factory for converting a FlowDocument Block into the corresponding layout element.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.FlowDocumentLayout
member.summary: FlowDocumentLayout performs layout of FlowDocument. The layout is adapted to the available space which is dependent on the (printer)device is used. FlowDocumentLayout will construct a tree of sub-layout elements all in charge of performing layout on a subset of the original flow document.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.ImageLayout
member.summary: Performs layout of a FlowDocument PrintImage.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.InlineCollectionLayout
member.summary: Performs layout of a list of inlines (e.g. texts/spans). Unlike blocks inlines continue on the same row until the end is reached. Dependening on the TextWrapping the inlines may continue on the next row (TextWrapping.Wrap) or the inline may be chopped (TextWrapping.NoWrap).

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.InlineLayout
member.summary: Performs layout on a FlowDocument Inline. Currently this class is hardcoded to layout Spans (which is a inline element).

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.NullPrintImageToGdiConverter
member.summary: A null converter to convert a GdiImage (i.e. a device context) to DeviceContext. Since GdiImage already provide a device context no conversion is needed, hence the null prefix.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.ParagraphLayout
member.summary: Performs layout of a FlowDocument Paragraph. A paragraph consists of a number of inline elements, typically spans.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Printer.GdiPrinter.TableLayout
member.summary: Performs layout of a FlowDocument Table. TableLayout arranges the content in a grid.

member.summary: Manual timer for testing purposes. Only raises Tick events on "FireTicks"

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Timers.Timer
member.summary: Timer that implements INeoTimer to help unit testing

member.name: M:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Utilities.NotificationLogic.UpdateNotificationMessage(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This function will show the notification message for exactly timeoutInSeconds if timeoutIsMinimumTimeToShow is set to false. if timeoutIsMinimumTimeToShow is set to true (default is true), then the notification message will be shown for at least timeoutInSeconds and not hidden until HideNotification is called after the time has elapsed.

member.name: T:Neo.ApplicationFramework.Common.Utilities.Threading.ITaskBuilder
member.summary: Helper class to create "fake" tasks using the TaskCompletionSource. Fake tasks is useful in tests when you want to mock results but also to connect convert asyncrounous operations that are event based to tasks.

member.name: M:System.StringExtensions.AddPrefix(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends the given prefix argument to a name using the separator in the pattern of prefix + separator + name provided the param requirements are fulfilled.
member.param: The string with the extension method beeing called upon must be neither null nor empty
Any prefix, that is neither null nor empty, will be used according to the pattern prefix + separator + name
The separator can be any string except null
